trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract base class from which all dynamic update notifications of changes to <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />s must be derived.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una classe di base astratta dalla quale devono essere derivate tutte le notifiche di aggiornamento dinamiche per le modifiche alla classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.

trans-unit.source: This class can be used by a tracking service to determine that <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>s have been dynamically updated.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe pu√≤ essere utilizzata da un servizio di rilevamento per determinare che la classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> sia stata aggiornata dinamicamente.

trans-unit.source: The derived classes indicate which <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> is being dynamically updated, and what operation is being performed (added to the workflow, removed from the workflow, or changed).
trans-unit.target: Le classi derivate indicano quale classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> viene aggiornata dinamicamente e quale operazione viene eseguita (aggiunta al flusso di lavoro, rimossa dal flusso di lavoro, o modificata).

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> to be changed.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposta a override in una classe derivata, ottiene la modifica del nome della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> to be changed.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> changes are occurring in.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> nella quale si stanno verificando le modifiche <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction" /> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposta a override in una classe derivata, verifica che la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction" /> sia configurata correttamente e non presenti errori.
